alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an indole moiety that carries an alkyl chain at the 3-position.
alternative_parents.name: 3-alkylindoles

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an indole moiety that carries an alkyl chain at the 1-position.
alternative_parents.name: N-alkylindoles

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, which consists of a monocyclic benzene moiety that carries a sulfonyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenesulfonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituent attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Benzoic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.
alternative_parents.name: Phenoxy compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a methoxybenzene or a derivative thereof.
alternative_parents.name: Anisoles

alternative_parents.description: Organic aromatic compounds containing a monocyclic benzene moiety carrying exactly or one more methoxy groups.
alternative_parents.name: Methoxybenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears a methane group.
alternative_parents.name: Toluenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl aryl ether functional group with the generic formula R-O-R' , where R is an alkyl group and R' is an aryl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl aryl ethers

alternative_parents.description: Organic heterocyclic compounds containing a N-methylated pyrrole.
alternative_parents.name: N-methylpyrroles

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds with the general formula RS(=O)(=O)N(R')R''  (R = organyl, R'-R\" = any atom but N).
alternative_parents.name: Aminosulfonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an aromatic ring where a carbon atom is linked to an hetero atom.
alternative_parents.name: Heteroaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an ester of carbamic acid with the general structure R2NC(=O)OR' (R' not H). They are esters of carbamic acids.
alternative_parents.name: Carbamate esters

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a sulfonic acid or derivative, with the general structure RS(=O)2X (R=alkyl, aryl; X=any heteroatom).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds comprising the organic carbonic acid or a derivative thereof.
alternative_parents.name: Organic carbonic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organonitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzenesulfonamides. These are organic compounds containing a sulfonamide group that is S-linked to a benzene ring.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing a sulfonamide group that is S-linked to a benzene ring.
direct_parent.name: Benzenesulfonamides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a sulfonamide group that is S-linked to a benzene ring.
subclass.name: Benzenesulfonamides

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
